ISSUE.TITLE: Regressions in post controller
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: #684 introduced some regressions in the post controller from v1. - `setup_postdata` is not called before preparing the post, which breaks filtering (such as `the_content`) - Passworded posts are not handled correctly - `post_date` is checked for `0000-00-00 00:00:00`, but `post_date_gmt` should be checked instead

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add new get_post_type_base method to dynamically determine endpoint path.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Dynamically build Post response _links using post_type base path. Fixes #738.
